client_region.caption: Region
client_region.description: Region to which the hosts belongs.

platform_type.caption: Platform Type
platform_type.description: Indicates whether the host is a physical machine or a virtual machine.

os_major_version.caption: OS Major Version
os_major_version.description: Primary version number indicating major updates.

os_minor_version.caption: OS Minor Version
os_minor_version.description: Numerical value for incremental OS changes.

internal_ip.caption: Internal IP
internal_ip.description: Internal IPv4 Address of the Host.

external_ip.caption: External IP
external_ip.description: External IPv4 Address of the Host.

exposed_external_ip.caption: Exposed External IP
exposed_external_ip.description: The external IPv4 address, belonging to hosts, which also possess the likelihood of being publicly accessible.

compliance_standard.caption: Compliance Standard
compliance_standard.description: Describes the compliance standard followed on the host.

vm_scan_method.caption: VM Scan Method
vm_scan_method.description: Methods used to scan a host by products used for Vulnerability Management (VM).

cloud_provider_url.caption: Cloud Provider URL
cloud_provider_url.description: Cloud Provider URL for that resource

cloud_resource_group_id.caption: Cloud Resource Group ID
cloud_resource_group_id.description: A logical collection or container used to manage and organize related resources, such as virtual machines, storage accounts, databases, etc.

cloud_resources_allocated.caption: Cloud Resources Allocated
cloud_resources_allocated.description: The resources used/allocacated to the host/cloud.

cloud_environments.caption: Environments
cloud_environments.description: Cloud Environments to which the resource belongs.

cloud_image.caption: Image
cloud_image.description: Refers to the container image you want to run. This can be an image hosted on a container registry like Azure Container Registry (ACR) or a public/private registry like Docker Hub.

cloud_image_pull_policy.caption: Cloud Image Pull Policy
cloud_image_pull_policy.description: Defines when Kubernetes should attempt to pull the image defined in a PodSpec (in Kubernetes). The policy can be one of the following:

cloud_region_location.caption: Cloud Region Location
cloud_region_location.description: Cloud location to which the host belongs.

cloud_created_at.caption: Created at in Cloud
cloud_created_at.description: Date when the host was created in the cloud platform.

cloud_service_account_name.caption: Service Account Name
cloud_service_account_name.description: An attribute within the Kubernetes Pod specification that specifies the Service Account associated with the Pod.

is_cloud_resource.caption: Is Cloud Resource
is_cloud_resource.description: Flag which says if a resource is cloud resource or not.

organization.caption: Organization
organization.description: Organization to which the host belongs.

organization_unit.caption: Organization Unit
organization_unit.description: Organization Unit to which the host belongs.

internet_exposed.caption: Internet Exposed
internet_exposed.description: Internet exposure status of the host. Derived from is internet accessible, tags, and open to internet.

host_sub_type.caption: Host Sub Type
host_sub_type.description: Classification of hosts within the broader classification of Type.

mdm_region.caption: MDM Region
mdm_region.description: Region to which the hosts belongs according the MDM sources.

mdm_is_managed.caption: MDM Managed
mdm_is_managed.description: Indicates whether the host is managed by MDM.

mdm_app_id.caption: Mdm App ID
mdm_app_id.description: MDM App ID of the device.

mdm_eas_status.caption: MDM EAS status
mdm_eas_status.description: Indicates the EAS Status of the host according to MDM.

client.caption: Client
client.description: Clients to which the host belongs.

client_group.caption: Client Group
client_group.description: Clients Group to which the host belongs.

client_status.caption: Client Status
client_status.description: Status of the client to which the host belongs.

location_id.caption: Location ID
location_id.description: The location ID corresponding to the location.

aad_display_name.caption: Azure AD Display Name
aad_display_name.description: Display Name of the host in Azure AD.

aad_account_enabled.caption: Azure AD Account Enabled
aad_account_enabled.description: true if the account is enabled; otherwise, false. Required. Default is true.

aad_approximate_last_signin_date.caption: Azure AD Approximate Last Signin Date
aad_approximate_last_signin_date.description: Approximate Last Signin date time seen in Azure AD.

aad_compliance_expiration_date.caption: Azure AD Compliance Expiration Date
aad_compliance_expiration_date.description: Compliance Expirartion date time as seen in Azure AD.

aad_on_premises_last_sync_date.caption: Azure AD On Premises Last Sync Date
aad_on_premises_last_sync_date.description: The last time at which the object was synced with the on-premises directory. The Timestamp type represents date and time information using ISO 8601 format and is always in UTC time.

aad_on_premises_sync_enabled.caption: Azure AD On Premises Sync Enabled
aad_on_premises_sync_enabled.description: true if this object is synced from an on-premises directory; false if this object was originally synced from an on-premises directory but is no longer synced; null if this object has never been synced from an on-premises directory (default). .

aad_profile_type.caption: Azure AD Profile Type
aad_profile_type.description: The profile type of the device. Possible values: RegisteredDevice (default), SecureVM, Printer, Shared, IoT.

aad_system_labels.caption: Azure AD System Labels
aad_system_labels.description: List of labels applied to the device by the system. .

aad_trust_type.caption: Azure AD Trust Type
aad_trust_type.description: Type of trust for the joined device.

aad_enrollment_profile_name.caption: Azure AD Enrollment Profile Name
aad_enrollment_profile_name.description: Enrollment profile applied to the device. For example, Apple Device Enrollment Profile, Device enrollment - Corporate device identifiers, or Windows Autopilot profile name. This property is set by Intune.

aad_asset_group_id.caption: Azure AD Asset Group ID
aad_asset_group_id.description: Azure AD Group ID to which the host belongs.

aad_group_names.caption: Azure AD Group Names
aad_group_names.description: Azure AD Groups to which the host belongs.

aad_operating_system.caption: Azure AD Operating System
aad_operating_system.description: Operating System obtained from Azure AD.

aad_device_region.caption: Azure AD Device Region
aad_device_region.description: Regions derived from Azure AD device category and hostnames.

aad_device_group_region.caption: Azure AD Device Group Region
aad_device_group_region.description: Regions derived from Azure AD group name and enrollment profile name.

tenablesc_dns_name.caption: Tenable.sc DNS Name
tenablesc_dns_name.description: DNS Name as seen in Tenable.sc.

tenablesc_scan_job.caption: Tenable.sc Scan Job
tenablesc_scan_job.description: List of scans done on the host that detected a vulnerability.

tenablesc_scan_type.caption: Tenable.sc Scan Type
tenablesc_scan_type.description: List of scan types done on the host that detected a vulnerability.

tenablesc_netbios_name.caption: Tenable.sc NetBios Name
tenablesc_netbios_name.description: Represents the NetBIOS name of each host.

tenablesc_netbios_workgroup.caption: Tenable.sc NetBios Workgroup
tenablesc_netbios_workgroup.description: Represents the NetBIOS work group name of each host.

tenablesc_mac_address.caption: Tenable.sc MAC Address
tenablesc_mac_address.description: Represents the MAC address of each host.

tenablesc_host_uuid.caption: Tenable.sc Host UUID
tenablesc_host_uuid.description: Universally unique identifier (UUID) assigned to each host by Tenable.sc

tenablesc_created_date.caption: Tenable.sc Created Time
tenablesc_created_date.description: Represents the timestamp when each host was created in Tenable.sc

tenablesc_first_seen.caption: Tenable.sc First Seen
tenablesc_first_seen.description: Represents the timestamp when each host was first seen by Tenable.sc

tenablesc_modified_date.caption: Tenable.sc Modified Time
tenablesc_modified_date.description: Represents the timestamp when each host was last modified in Tenable.sc

tenablesc_acr_score.caption: Tenable.sc ACR Score
tenablesc_acr_score.description: Represents the Asset Exposure Score (ACR) of each host in Tenable.sc.Tenable assigns an ACR to each asset on your network to represent the asset's relative criticality as an integer from 1 to 10. A higher ACR indicates higher criticality.

tenablesc_acr_capability.caption: Tenable.sc ACR Capability
tenablesc_acr_capability.description: Represents the capability of device associated with each host in

tenablesc_aes_score.caption: Tenable.sc AES Score
tenablesc_aes_score.description: Represents the Asset Exposure Score (AES) of each host in Tenable Security Center .Tenable calculates a dynamic AES for each asset on your network to represent the asset's relative exposure as an integer between 0 and 1000. A higher AES indicates higher exposure.

tenablesc_internet_exposure.caption: Tenable.sc Internet Exposure
tenablesc_internet_exposure.description: ACR Internet Exposure as per Tenable.sc

itop_power_state.caption: iTOP Power State
itop_power_state.description: Indicates whether a host is powered on or off.

itop_role.caption: iTOP Role
itop_role.description: Specifies the function or purpose of the host.

itop_tier_level.caption: iTOP Tier Level
itop_tier_level.description: Refers to the level of importance or criticality of a host.

itop_device_condition.caption: iTOP Device Condition
itop_device_condition.description: The current condition of the PC.
itop_device_condition.examples: damaged, lost, operational, sold, in_transit, unknown, ready_for_delivery

itop_termination_date.caption: iTOP Termination Date
itop_termination_date.description: Date and time on which the computer was terminated.

itop_go_live_date.caption: iTOP Go Live Date
itop_go_live_date.description: Date and time when the PC was moved into production.

itop_device_name.caption: iTOP Device Name
itop_device_name.description: Indicates the network device name or hostname for the user's PC.

itop_server_vm_name.caption: iTOP Server VM Name
itop_server_vm_name.description: VM Name as per iTOP server.

itop_vmware_name.caption: iTOP VMWare Name
itop_vmware_name.description: Virtual machine name as per iTOP VM.

itop_sam_account_name.caption: iTOP SAM Account Name
itop_sam_account_name.description: The SAM Account Name as per iTOP.

itop_last_report.caption: iTOP Last Report
itop_last_report.description: Date and time of the last report from the ITOP agent.

itop_ccms_location_code.caption: iTOP CCMS Location Code
itop_ccms_location_code.description: Location code of the computer in the Customer Care Management System (CCMS). CCMS is  internally developed system where all call center activity is managed.

itop_it_location_code.caption: iTOP IT Location Code
itop_it_location_code.description: Location code of the computer in the IT inventory system.

itop_client.caption: Clients as per iTOP
itop_client.description: Clients to which the host belongs.

itop_hypervisor.caption: iTOP Hypervisor Full Name
itop_hypervisor.description: Hypervisor Full Name as seen in iTOP.

itop_ownership.caption: iTOP Ownership
itop_ownership.description: Owner of the hardware as of iTOP.

itop_pc_country.caption: iTOP PC Country
itop_pc_country.description: The country obtained from iTOP PC based on the organizational unit.

itop_server_country.caption: iTOP Server Country
itop_server_country.description: The country obtained from iTOP Server based on the organization.

itop_vmware_country.caption: iTOP VMWare Country
itop_vmware_country.description: The country obtained from iTOP VMware based on the organization.

crowdstrike_connection_mac_address.caption: CrowdStrike Mac Address
crowdstrike_connection_mac_address.description: MAC address used by the sensor to communicate with the cloud.

crowdstrike_site_name.caption: CrowdStrike Site Name
crowdstrike_site_name.description: The site name of the device.

crowdstrike_containment_status.caption: CrowdStrike Containment status
crowdstrike_containment_status.description: The containment status of the machine. Possible values are: "normal", "containment_pending", "contained", and "lift_containment_pending".

crowdstrike_deployment_type.caption: CrowdStrike Deployment Type
crowdstrike_deployment_type.description: For Linux hosts, deployment method of the Falcon sensor for Linux or the Falcon Container sensor for Linux. Possible values are Standard or DaemonSet.

crowdstrike_detection_suppression_status.caption: CrowdStrike Detection Suppression Status
crowdstrike_detection_suppression_status.description: Status or configuration of the suppression of security detections or alerts within the CrowdStrike Falcon platform.

crowdstrike_zone_group.caption: CrowdStrike Zone Group
crowdstrike_zone_group.description: geographical or logical groupings of endpoints and networks.

crowdstrike_instance_id.caption: CrowdStrike Cloud Instance ID
crowdstrike_instance_id.description: Cloud instance ID of Host as per croud strike.

crowdstrike_service_provider_account_id.caption: CrowdStrike Service Provider Account ID
crowdstrike_service_provider_account_id.description: Service provider account or subscription id of host as per CrowdStrike.

crowdstrike_os_product_name.caption: CrowdStrike OS Product Name
crowdstrike_os_product_name.description: OS Product Name as per CrowdStrike.

crowdstrike_os_platform_name.caption: CrowdStrike OS Platform Name
crowdstrike_os_platform_name.description: OS Platform Name as per CrowdStrike.

crowdstrike_operational_lifetime.caption: CrowdStrike Operational Lifetime
crowdstrike_operational_lifetime.description: The lifetime of Hosts from CrowdStrike.

crowdstrike_region.caption: CrowdStrike Region
crowdstrike_region.description: Region based on CrowdStrike Customer ID.

crowdstrike_zta_sensor_signals.caption: CrowdStrike ZTA Sensor Signals
crowdstrike_zta_sensor_signals.description: The ZTA Sensor Signals and it's parameters.

crowdstrike_zta_os_signals.caption: CrowdStrike ZTA OS Signals
crowdstrike_zta_os_signals.description: The ZTA OS Signals and it's parameters.

is_mobile.caption: Is Mobile
is_mobile.description: Indicates id the device is mobile or not.

wiz_is_kubernetes_node.caption: Is Kubernetes Node as per Wiz
wiz_is_kubernetes_node.description: Indicates whether the resource is a Kubernetes node as per wiz

wiz_kubernetes_flavor.caption: Kubernetes Flavor as per Wiz
wiz_kubernetes_flavor.description: The flavor of Kubernetes used as per Wiz.

wiz_kubernetes_env_from.caption: Kubernetes Env From as per Wiz
wiz_kubernetes_env_from.description: The Field is used within Kubernetes PodSpec or ContainerSpec to define a source from which the container should inherit its environmental variables.

wiz_subscription_id.caption: Wiz Subscription ID
wiz_subscription_id.description: This is a unique identifier assigned by Wiz for a Subscription External ID

wiz_kubernetes_namespace_external_Id.caption: Kubernetes Namespace External ID
wiz_kubernetes_namespace_external_Id.description: The ID given to the cluster resources that are divided between multiple users, teams, or projects.

wiz_kubernetes_node_external_Id.caption: Kubernetes Node External ID
wiz_kubernetes_node_external_Id.description: It is a unique identifier assigned to each node in the Kubernetes cluster.

wiz_kubernetes_pod_external_Id.caption: Kubernetes Pod External ID
wiz_kubernetes_pod_external_Id.description: Each pod is identified by its unique name within its namespace

wiz_kubernetes_cluster_external_Id.caption: Kubernetes Cluster External ID
wiz_kubernetes_cluster_external_Id.description: A unique identifier associated with a Kubernetes cluster in certain contexts or systems that integrate with Kubernetes.

wiz_kubernetes_cluster_name.caption: Kubernetes Cluster Name
wiz_kubernetes_cluster_name.description: The name assigned to a Kubernetes cluster within the Kubernetes ecosystem.

wiz_memory_gb.caption: Memory (in GB)
wiz_memory_gb.description: The memory allocated to the resource (in GB)

wiz_total_disks.caption: Total Disks
wiz_total_disks.description: Number of disks used/allottted to the resoure

wiz_virtual_cpus.caption: Virtual CPUs
wiz_virtual_cpus.description: Number of Virtual CPUs used/allottted to the resoure

wiz_projects.caption: Wiz Projects
wiz_projects.description: The project information associated with the resource.

wiz_active_services.caption: Active Services as per Wiz
wiz_active_services.description: Refers to active services running in the host.

wiz_is_container_host.caption: Is Container Host as per Wiz
wiz_is_container_host.description: Indicates that this resource is used to host containers in managed Kubernetes clusters.

wiz_is_container_host_scanned.caption: Is Container Host scanned as per Wiz
wiz_is_container_host_scanned.description: Indicated whether the container host was scanned by Wiz

wiz_is_container_cluster_connected.caption: Is Container Cluster Connected as per Wiz
wiz_is_container_cluster_connected.description: Indicates whether the cluster running the container is connected to Wiz for effective analysis of the container network and identity.

wiz_is_scanned_from_non_os_disk.caption: Is Scanned from Non-OS Disk as per Wiz
wiz_is_scanned_from_non_os_disk.description: Indicates whether Wiz scanned the container from a non-os disk

wiz_is_default_security_context.caption: Is Default Security Context as per Wiz
wiz_is_default_security_context.description: A Security Context defines privilege and access control settings for a Pod or a Container (e.g., privileged mode, read/write permissions to filesystem, etc.). If the flag is set, the Pod or Container security context wasn't altered by the user, so it fallbacks on the default configuration for the given environment.

wiz_is_ephemeral.caption: Is Ephemeral as per Wiz
wiz_is_ephemeral.description: This property indicates when a resource is ephemeral.

wiz_is_serverless_container.caption: Is Serverless Container
wiz_is_serverless_container.description: This property indicated whether this VM is a server less container.

wiz_password_authentication_disabled.caption: Is Password Authentication Disabled as per Wiz
wiz_password_authentication_disabled.description: Indicates whether the password authentication is disabled or not.

wiz_has_admin_privileges.caption: Has Admin Privileges as per Wiz
wiz_has_admin_privileges.description: This property indicated whether this VM is has admin Privilage.

wiz_has_high_privileges.caption: Has High Privileges as per Wiz
wiz_has_high_privileges.description: This property indicated whether this VM has high privilage.

wiz_has_sensitive_data.caption: Has Sensitive Data as per Wiz
wiz_has_sensitive_data.description: This property indicated whether this VM has sensitive data.

wiz_number_of_addresses_open_for_http.caption: Number of Addresses Open for HTTP as per Wiz
wiz_number_of_addresses_open_for_http.description: Number of external IP addresses that have access to the resource on non-standard ports, which includes all ports except 80 (HTTP), 443 (HTTPS), 22 (SSH), 3389 (RDP), 5985 (WINRM) and 5986 (WINRM).

wiz_number_of_addresses_open_for_https.caption: Number of Addresses Open for HTTPS as per Wiz
wiz_number_of_addresses_open_for_https.description: Number of external IP addresses that have access to the resource on port 443.

wiz_number_of_addresses_open_for_non_sta.caption: Number of Addresses Open for Non Standard Ports as per Wiz
wiz_number_of_addresses_open_for_non_sta.description: Number of external IP addresses that have access to the resource on non standard ports.

wiz_number_of_addresses_open_for_rdp.caption: Number of Addresses Open for RDP as per Wiz
wiz_number_of_addresses_open_for_rdp.description: Number of external IP addresses that have access to the resource on port 3389 (RDP).

wiz_number_of_addresses_open_for_ssh.caption: Number of Addresses Open for SSH as per Wiz
wiz_number_of_addresses_open_for_ssh.description: Number of external IP addresses that have access to the resource on port 22 (SSH).

wiz_number_of_addresses_open_for_winrm.caption: Number of Addresses Open for WINRM as per Wiz
wiz_number_of_addresses_open_for_winrm.description: Number of external IP addresses that have access to the resource on port 5985/5986 (WINRM).

wiz_open_to_all_internet.caption: Open to All Internet as per Wiz
wiz_open_to_all_internet.description:
Indicates whether this resource is accessible from the public internet.
Wiz effective exposure analysis is based on the Wiz graph network algorithm analyzing ports, protocols, IPs, security groups, peering, and configs to determine network reachability.

wiz_resource_last_seen.caption: Wiz Resource Last Seen
wiz_resource_last_seen.description: Date on which Wiz last scanned the machine.

wiz_created_at.caption: Created at in Cloud as per Wiz
wiz_created_at.description: Date on which the resource was created in the cloud platform.

wiz_is_accessible_from_internet.caption: Internet Exposure as per Wiz
wiz_is_accessible_from_internet.description:
Indicates whether this resource is accessible from at least one internet address.
Wiz effective exposure analysis is based on the Wiz graph network algorithm analyzing ports, protocols, IPs, security groups, peering, and configs to determine network reachability.

wiz_cloud_provider.caption: Wiz Cloud Provider
wiz_cloud_provider.description: The cloud provider detail given in Wiz.

wiz_security_context_privileged.caption: Is Security Context Privileged as per Wiz
wiz_security_context_privileged.description: Indicates whether the host has privilege as per Wiz security context.

wiz_security_context_runs_as_root.caption: Is Security Context Runs as Root as per Wiz
wiz_security_context_runs_as_root.description: Indicates whether the host runs as root as per Wiz security context.

wiz_resource_type.caption: Wiz Resource Type
wiz_resource_type.description: Cloud resource type as per Wiz.

wiz_operational_lifetime.caption: Wiz Operational Lifetime
wiz_operational_lifetime.description: The lifetime of Hosts from Wiz.

tenable_io_last_licensed_scan_date.caption: Tenable.io Last Licensed Scan Date
tenable_io_last_licensed_scan_date.description: The time and date of the last scan that identified the asset as licensed. Tenable.io categorizes an asset as licensed if a scan of that asset has returned results from a non-discovery plugin within the last 90 days.

tenable_io_source_name.caption: Tenable.io Source Name
tenable_io_source_name.description:
The sources of the scans that identified the asset. An asset source is the entity that reported the asset details. Sources can include sensors, connectors, and API imports. If your request specifies multiple sources, Tenable.io returns all assets seen by any of the specified sources.

The items in the sources array must correspond to the names of the sources as defined in your organization's implementation of Tenable.io.

tenable_io_license_status.caption: Tenable.io License Status
tenable_io_license_status.description: The Tenable.io License Status is determined by checking if there has been a scan within the last 90 days that identified the asset as licensed. If the last scan date is not null (indicating a recent scan), the status is set to 'true', otherwise 'false'.

tenableio_plugin_status.caption: Tenable.io Plugin Status
tenableio_plugin_status.description: Specifies whether the asset has Tenable.io plugin results associated with it.

tenable_io_active_services.caption: Tenable.io Active Services
tenable_io_active_services.description: Services running on the asset determined by Tenable.io.

tenable_io_hostnames.caption: Tenable.io Hostnames
tenable_io_hostnames.description: The hostnames that Tenable.io scans have associated with the asset record.

tenable_io_agent_names.caption: Tenable.io Agent Names
tenable_io_agent_names.description: The names of any Nessus agents (Tenable.io Agents) that scanned and identified the asset.

tenable_io_netbios_names.caption: Tenable.io NetBIOS Names
tenable_io_netbios_names.description: The NetBIOS names that Tenable.io scans have associated with the asset record.

tenable_io_operating_systems.caption: Tenable.io Operating Systems
tenable_io_operating_systems.description: The operating systems that Tenable.io scans have associated with the asset record.

tenable_io_created_at.caption: Tenable.io Created At
tenable_io_created_at.description: The time and date when Tenable.io created the asset record.

tenable_io_first_seen_date.caption: Tenable.io First Seen Date
tenable_io_first_seen_date.description: The time and date when a Tenable.io scan first identified the asset.

tenable_io_first_scan_date.caption: Tenable.io First Scan Date
tenable_io_first_scan_date.description: The date of the first Tenable.io scan run against the asset.

tenable_io_fqdns.caption: Tenable.io FQDNs
tenable_io_fqdns.description: The FQDNs that Tenable.io scans have associated with the asset record.

tenable_io_mac_address.caption: Tenable.io MAC Addresses
tenable_io_mac_address.description: The MAC addresses that Tenable.io scans have associated with the asset record.

itop_user_organization.caption: iTOP User Organization
itop_user_organization.description: Organization to which the Person belongs as of iTOPO.

itop_user_status.caption: iTOP User Status
itop_user_status.description: The user status of the entity as of iTOP.

crowdstrike_agent_version.caption: CrowdStrike Agent Version
crowdstrike_agent_version.description: The Agent Version of the EDR installed on the Device.

crowdstrike_latest_agent_version.caption: CrowdStrike Latest Agent Version
crowdstrike_latest_agent_version.description: Represents the latest available CrowdStrike agent version corresponding to the specific operating system.

tenable_io_acr_score.caption: Tenable.io ACR Score
tenable_io_acr_score.description: The ACR score according to Tenable.io

tenable_io_exposure_score.caption: Tenable.io Exposure Score
tenable_io_exposure_score.description: The ACR score according to Tenable.io

tanium_critical_patch_pending_restart.caption: Tanium Patches - Pending Restart (Critical)
tanium_critical_patch_pending_restart.description: Patches with critical severity for which the restart is pending according to Tanium.

tanium_critical_patch_not_installed.caption: Tanium Patches - Not Installed (Critical)
tanium_critical_patch_not_installed.description: Patches with critical severity which are not installed according to Tanium.

tanium_important_patch_pending_restart.caption: Tanium Patches - Pending Restart (Important)
tanium_important_patch_pending_restart.description: Patches with important severity for which the restart is pending according to Tanium.

tanium_important_patch_not_installed.caption: Tanium Patches - Not Installed (Important)
tanium_important_patch_not_installed.description: Patches with important severity which are not installed according to Tanium.

tanium_moderate_patch_pending_restart.caption: Tanium Patches - Pending Restart (Moderate)
tanium_moderate_patch_pending_restart.description: Patches with moderate severity for which the restart is pending according to Tanium.

tanium_moderate_patch_not_installed.caption: Tanium Patches - Not Installed (Moderate)
tanium_moderate_patch_not_installed.description: Patches with moderate severity which are not installed according to Tanium.

tanium_low_patch_pending_restart.caption: Tanium Patches - Pending Restart (Low)
tanium_low_patch_pending_restart.description: Patches with low severity for which the restart is pending according to Tanium.

tanium_low_patch_not_installed.caption: Tanium Patches - Not Installed (Low)
tanium_low_patch_not_installed.description: Patches with low severity which are not installed according to Tanium.

tanium_none_patch_pending_restart.caption: Tanium Patches - Pending Restart (None)
tanium_none_patch_pending_restart.description: Patches with none severity for which the restart is pending according to Tanium.

tanium_none_patch_not_installed.caption: Tanium Patches - Not Installed (None)
tanium_none_patch_not_installed.description: Patches with none severity which are not installed according to Tanium.

tanium_country.caption: Tanium Country
tanium_country.description: The country name derived from Tanium custom tags.

tanium_client.caption: Tanium Client
tanium_client.description: The client names derived from Tanium custom tags.

rapid7_client.caption: Rapid7 Client
rapid7_client.description: The client names derived from Rapid7 tags.

tanium_business_unit.caption: Tanium Business Unit
tanium_business_unit.description: The business units derived from Tanium custom tags.

intune_device_category_display_name.caption: Intune Device Category Display Name
intune_device_category_display_name.description: The device category display name of the endpoint as of Tanium.

intune_device_name.caption: Intune Device Name
intune_device_name.description: The device name of the endpoint as of Tanium.

intune_onboarding_status.caption: Intune Onboarding status
intune_onboarding_status.description: Determines whether the host asset is reachable from the Internet (External) or is only accessible from their internal network (Internal). In some cases, it may not be possible to determine this, in which case it would be assigned the value Unknown.

intune_android_security_patch_level.caption: Intune Android Security Patch Level
intune_android_security_patch_level.description: Android security patch level according to Intune.

rapid7_site_country_code.caption: Rapid7 Site Country Code
rapid7_site_country_code.description: The country code extracted from Rapid7 site name

rapid7_asset_group_country_code.caption: Rapid7 Asset Group Country Code
rapid7_asset_group_country_code.description: The country code extracted from the Rapid7 asset group name.

asset_visibility.caption: Asset Visibility
asset_visibility.description: Determines whether the host asset is reachable from the Internet (External) or is only accessible from their internal network (Internal). In some cases, it may not be possible to determine this, in which case it would be assigned the value Unknown.

asset_environment.caption: Asset Environment
asset_environment.description: The environment in which the asset exists in. Depending on the clients architecture, it may be necessary to extend the values that can be assigned.

asset_purpose_rating.caption: Asset Purpose Rating
asset_purpose_rating.description: Asset Purpose Rating is a numeric score ranging from 0 to 1 based on the purpose of the asset.

zta_compliance.caption: ZTA RAG Compliance
zta_compliance.description: It refers to aligning an organization's security practices, policies, and infrastructure with the principles of Zero Trust Architecture.

host_meet_zta_compliance.caption: ZTA Compliant
host_meet_zta_compliance.description: Indicates whether ZTA score is above 95.

is_in_vm_scope.caption: Is Host in VM Scan Scope
is_in_vm_scope.description: Indicates whether the host is either located in the EMEA region or if it's a cloud-based resource

host_zta_reporting_status.caption: Host ZTA Reporting Status
host_zta_reporting_status.description: Indicates what the ZTA Reporting Status is.

is_domain_joined.caption: Is Domain Joined
is_domain_joined.description: Indicates whether the host is joined to domain or not.

is_hostname_convention_compliant.caption: Is Hostname Convention Compliant
is_hostname_convention_compliant.description: Indicates whether the hostname conforms to the TP Global Naming Convention.

derived_region.caption: Derived Region
derived_region.description: Region determined from the iTOP IT Location Code, Hostname and directly from data sources, with priority given to the iTOP IT Location Code and Hostname. iTOP Location Code XX, TPS and NA are excluded.

derived_country.caption: Derived Country
derived_country.description: Country determined from the iTOP IT Location Code, Hostname and directly from data sources, with priority given to the iTOP IT Location Code and Hostname. iTOP Location Code XX, TPS and NA are excluded.

hostname_prefix_country.caption: Hostname Prefix Country
hostname_prefix_country.description: Country inferred from first two letters of hostname if first five are alphabets and the string has no special characters or spaces.

hostname_prefix_country_iso.caption: Hostname Prefix Country ISO
hostname_prefix_country_iso.description: Country ISO derived from the first two characters of the Display Label, provided the first five characters are alphabets with no special characters or spaces. This does not necessarily indicate a TP operating country.

strategic_region.caption: Strategic Region
strategic_region.description: Startegic Region Determined from lookup table.

cluster_bu.caption: Cluster BU
cluster_bu.description: Cluster or Business Unit Determined from lookup table.

itop_country.caption: iTOP Country
itop_country.description: Country determined from the iTOP IT Location Code. iTOP Location Code XX, TPS and NA are excluded.

itop_region.caption: iTOP Region
itop_region.description: Region determined from the iTOP IT Location Code. iTOP Location Code XX, TPS and NA are excluded.

is_valid_hostname_country_code.caption: Hostname contains Country Code
is_valid_hostname_country_code.description: Indicates whether hostname contains valid country code.

display_label_category.caption: Display Label Category
display_label_category.description: Categorizing display labels as IP Addresses, MAC Addresses, Serial Numbers, Azure AD Device ID, Identifiers, and others.

derived_type.caption: Derived Type
derived_type.description: Type determined from type, hostname_type and display label category.

hostname_contains_type.caption: Hostname contains Type
hostname_contains_type.description: Indicates whether hostname contains host type.

zero_life.caption: Zero Life
zero_life.description: Indicates whether the host is a zero life device.

ad_group.caption: AD Groups
ad_group.description: The distinguishedName of any Active Directory groups the computer is explicitly a member of

windows_account_name.caption: LAPS Policy Configuration - Windows : Account Name
windows_account_name.description: Windows Account Name of LAPS Policy Configuration

windows_password_length.caption: LAPS Policy Configuration - Windows : Password Length

windows_password_age_day.caption: LAPS Policy Configuration - Windows : Password Age Day

windows_password_complexity.caption: LAPS Policy Configuration - Windows : Password Complexity

windows_password_last_set.caption: LAPS Policy Configuration - Windows : Password Last Set

tanium_custom_tags.caption: Tanium Custom Tags
tanium_custom_tags.description: Any specified custom tags set for the machine.

tanium_ad_short_domain.caption: Tanium AD Short Domain
tanium_ad_short_domain.description: Provide region and country of the host

tanium_domain_role.caption: Tanium AD Domain Role
tanium_domain_role.description: Returns the Active Directory domain role.

aad_organizational_unit.caption: Tanium AD Organizational Unit
aad_organizational_unit.description: AD Organizational Unit as in Tanium.

enriched_country_active.caption: Enriched Country-Active
enriched_country_active.description: The countries for which the location status is true.

enriched_country_inactive.caption: Enriched Country-Inactive
enriched_country_inactive.description: The countries for which the location status is false.

crowdstrike_machine_domain_country.caption: CrowdStrike Machine Domain Country
crowdstrike_machine_domain_country.description: Country extracted from domain field in CrowdStrike.

crowdstrike_site_name_country.caption: CrowdStrike Site Name Country
crowdstrike_site_name_country.description: Country extracted from site name field in CrowdStrike.

crowdstrike_ou_country.caption: CrowdStrike OU Country
crowdstrike_ou_country.description: Country extracted from organization unit field in CrowdStrike.

crowdstrike_tags_country.caption: CrowdStrike Tags Country
crowdstrike_tags_country.description: Country extracted from tags field in CrowdStrike.

crowdstrike_zone_group_country.caption: CrowdStrike Zone Group Country
crowdstrike_zone_group_country.description: Country extracted from Zone Group field in CrowdStrike.

crowdstrike_tag_cc_country.caption: CrowdStrike Tag Cc Country
crowdstrike_tag_cc_country.description: Country derived from tags field in CrowdStrike using country codes present in tags field.

crowdstrike_site_cc_country.caption: CrowdStrike Site Cc Country
crowdstrike_site_cc_country.description: Country derived from site field in CrowdStrike using country codes present in tags field.

itop_user_pc_country.caption: Itop User Pc Country
itop_user_pc_country.description: Country extracted from user pc information in itop.

itop_organization_cc_country.caption: Itop Organization Cc Country
itop_organization_cc_country.description: Country derived from itop organization name using country code.

rapid7_configurations_attributes_country.caption: Rapid7 Configurations Attributes Country
rapid7_configurations_attributes_country.description: Country extracted from configuration attributes in Rapid7.

rapid7_configurations_attributes_cc_coun.caption: Rapid7 Configurations Attributes Cc Country
rapid7_configurations_attributes_cc_coun.description: Country derived from config attributes using country code.

rapid7_tag_cc_country.caption: Rapid7 Tag Cc Country
rapid7_tag_cc_country.description: Country derived from tags using country codes in Rapid7.

rapid7_tag_country.caption: Rapid7 Tag Country
rapid7_tag_country.description: Country extracted from tag field in Rapid7.

tanium_code_countries.caption: Tanium Code Countries
tanium_code_countries.description: Country derived country codes extracted from Tanium Custom Tags.

tanium_ad_user_country.caption: Tanium Ad User Country
tanium_ad_user_country.description: Country extracted from AD user information in Tanium.

tanium_ad_groups_country.caption: Tanium Ad Groups Country
tanium_ad_groups_country.description: Country extracted from AD group fields in Tanium.

tanium_ad_short_domain_country.caption: Tanium Ad Short Domain Country
tanium_ad_short_domain_country.description: Country extracted from short domain fields in Tanium.

tanium_ad_org_unit_cc_country.caption: Tanium Ad Org Unit Cc Country
tanium_ad_org_unit_cc_country.description: Country derived from org unit using country code in Tanium.

tanium_ad_organizational_unit_country.caption: Tanium Ad Organizational Unit Country
tanium_ad_organizational_unit_country.description: Country extracted from organizational unit in Tanium.

tenablesc_country.caption: Tenablesc Country
tenablesc_country.description: Country extracted from tenablesc site name and hostname.

collected_country_crowdstrike.caption: Collected Country CrowdStrike
collected_country_crowdstrike.description: Country collected from all available CrowdStrike data points.

collected_country.caption: Collected Country
collected_country.description: All countries collected from various sources.

crowdstrike_frequent_country.caption: CrowdStrike Frequent Country
crowdstrike_frequent_country.description: Most frequent country values from CrowdStrike.

itop_frequent_country.caption: Itop Frequent Country
itop_frequent_country.description: Most frequent country values from iTOP.

rapid7_frequent_country.caption: Rapid7 Frequent Country
rapid7_frequent_country.description: Most frequent country values from Rapid7.

tanium_frequent_country.caption: Tanium Frequent Country
tanium_frequent_country.description: Most frequent country values from Tanium.

tenablesc_frequent_country.caption: Tenablesc Frequent Country
tenablesc_frequent_country.description: Most frequent country values from Tenablesc.

source_frequent_country.caption: Source Frequent Country
source_frequent_country.description: Most frequent country value per source.

frequent_collected_country_all_sources.caption: Frequent Collected Country All Sources
frequent_collected_country_all_sources.description: Most frequent country across all sources.

frequent_country_all_sources_ambiguity_f.caption: Frequent Country All Sources Ambiguity Flag
frequent_country_all_sources_ambiguity_f.description: Ambiguity flag for all sources frequent country.

flattened_collected_country_datapoint.caption: Flattened Collected Country Datapoint
flattened_collected_country_datapoint.description: Flattened view of all collected country datapoints.

collected_country_datapoint_source_group.caption: Collected Country Datapoint Source Group
collected_country_datapoint_source_group.description: Grouped datapoint country values by source.

source_country_ambiguity_flag.caption: Source Country Ambiguity Flag
source_country_ambiguity_flag.description: Ambiguity in country values per source.

source_to_hostname_country_intersect_amb.caption: Source To Hostname Country Intersect Ambiguity Flag
source_to_hostname_country_intersect_amb.description: Ambiguity flag for intersection between source and hostname country.

final_country.caption: Country
final_country.description: Country output of all different processes.

country_extraction_method.caption: Country Extraction Method
country_extraction_method.description: Method by which country data is extracted

enriched_country.caption: Enriched Country
enriched_country.description: The country list which has been enriched from other sources.

encryption_compliance.caption: Encryption Compliance
encryption_compliance.description: Evaluates whether the device is fully encrypted. Marks it Compliant when BitLocker or FileVault reports protection on and fully encrypted; otherwise marks it Non Compliant.

qualys_onboarding_status.caption: Qualys Onboarding Status
qualys_onboarding_status.description: Status of the asset's onboarding in Qualys.

qualys_first_found_date.caption: Qualys First Found Date
qualys_first_found_date.description: The date the asset was first found in Qualys.

qualys_location_attr_country.caption: Qualys Location Attribute Country
qualys_location_attr_country.description: Country derived from Qualys location attribute.

qualys_asset_tag_attr_country.caption: Qualys Asset Tag Attribute Country
qualys_asset_tag_attr_country.description: Country derived from Qualys asset tag attribute.

qualys_tag_cc_country.caption: Qualys Tag CC Country
qualys_tag_cc_country.description: Country code from Qualys tag CC.

qualys_ip.caption: Qualys IP
qualys_ip.description: IP address of the asset as seen in Qualys.

qualys_feed_country.caption: Qualys Feed Country
qualys_feed_country.description: Country derived from Qualys feed data.

qualys_user_def_value1_text.caption: Qualys User Defined Value 1
qualys_user_def_value1_text.description: Custom user-defined text field 1 from Qualys.

qualys_user_def_value2_text.caption: Qualys User Defined Value 2
qualys_user_def_value2_text.description: Custom user-defined text field 2 from Qualys.

qualys_user_def_value3_text.caption: Qualys User Defined Value 3
qualys_user_def_value3_text.description: Custom user-defined text field 3 from Qualys.

merged_rapid7_countries.caption: Rapid7 InsightVM Consolidated Countries
merged_rapid7_countries.description: Countries extracted from various fields of Rapid7 InsightVM.

merged_tanium_tags_country.caption: Tanium Tags Consolidated Countries
merged_tanium_tags_country.description: Countries extracted from Tanium Custom Tags.

merged_crowdstrike_countries.caption: CrowdStrike Consolidated Countries
merged_crowdstrike_countries.description: Countries extracted from various fields of CrowdStrike.

count_merged_rapid7_countries.caption: Count of Rapid7 InsightVM Consolidated Countries
count_merged_rapid7_countries.description: Indicates the count of unique countries extracted from various fields of Rapid7 InsightVM.

count_merged_tanium_tags_country.caption: Count of Tanium Tags Consolidated Countries
count_merged_tanium_tags_country.description: Indicates the count of unique countries extracted from Tanium Custom Tags.

count_merged_crowdstrike_countries.caption: Count of CrowdStrike Consolidated Countries
count_merged_crowdstrike_countries.description: Indicates the count of unique countries extracted from various fields of CrowdStrike.

count_rapid7_site_name.caption: Count of Rapid7 Site Name
count_rapid7_site_name.description: Indicates the count of unique Rapid7 InsightVM Site IDs.

count_rapid7_site_id.caption: Count of Rapid7 Site ID
count_rapid7_site_id.description: Indicates the count of unique Rapid7 InsightVM Site Names.

open_ports.caption: Open Ports
open_ports.description: List of open ports detected on the host.

services.caption: Services
services.description: List of service names detected running on the host.

zta_score.caption: ZTA Score
zta_score.description: Normalized Zero Trust Assessment value, defaulting to 0 when no CrowdStrike score exists and otherwise scaling the score to a 01 range.
